title: Direct Marketing Metrics
description: Quantifiable measures used to track and assess the status of a direct marketing business process.

sends.title: Sends
sends.description: Number of asynchronous message (email, SMS, MMS etc) has been dispatched to an persons account/address/device.

bounces.title: Bounces
bounces.description: Number of asynchronous message has been returned by the receiving system.

nonDeliverables.title: Non-deliverables
nonDeliverables.description: Number of asynchronous message failed to deliver in a way that indicates that no future messages will be deliverable either to this address.

mirrorPages.title: Mirror Pages
mirrorPages.description: Number of mirror pages for which a link to the online mirror page of a message has been clicked..

userComplaints.title: User Complaints
userComplaints.description: Number of user complaints has been received. This generally occurred when a recipient of a message reported it as spam.
